trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_SEQ_00<tab>Lucinne is in need of an extra pair of hands.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_TODO_00<tab>Obtain soil samples from the Comet's Tail.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a water sample from the Comet's Tail.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_000<tab>Oh, you're the adventurer from before. Have you come for more work? Because I could certainly do with an extra hand or two.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_001<tab>My analysis of the samples you brought me is coming along quite nicely, but there is one more area I would have you investigate.

TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_002<tab>There's a cavern southeast of here, the Comet's Tail, so named for the glowing ore covering its walls and ceiling, as if the gods themselves captured starlight and placed it there.

TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_003<tab>Despite its supposed beauty, however, I have heard reports that the area has been adversely affected by pollution. As before I need you to procure three samples of the soil and one of the water so I can ascertain the truth of what has happened there.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_004<tab>Whatever damage has been done to that cavern, I pray it is not irreversible. I will require samples of both the soil and water there to be certain.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_010<tab>Did you have trouble procuring the samples?
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_011<tab>Yes, this is perfect. Perhaps someday soon we can restore the cave to what it once was.

TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_012<tab>You see, the Comet's Tail was once a place of worship. Legend has it that, as the great flood of the Sixth Umbral Calamity swept across Eorzea, Rhalgr cast a great beacon into the sky to lead His people to safety. That beacon would one day fall to earth, and its remains are what illuminate that cave.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_013<tab>The Ala Mhigans placed altars within, and would often visit to offer up prayers to Rhalgr. Of course, that all changed when the Garleans came...
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_014<tab>No one is certain for what purpose the cave was closed off, but some say it was used as a crude weapons research facility.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_015<tab>Whatever the truth may be, I will find it, and restore what was taken from the Ala Mhigans.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_016<tab>When that day comes, I hope you'll go and pay the Comet's Tail a visit.
